pr_title: Cut over from SearchContext to ReaderContext

timeline.message: Cut over from SearchContext to ReaderContext
notify when releasing a search context

timeline.bodyText: I think we can remove Lifetime entirely. We don't use COLLECTION so it would be easier to just call addReleasable(Releasable).
timeline.author: jimczi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -411,10 +377,6 @@ public final boolean hasOnlySuggest() {
          * This life time is for objects that only live during collection time.
          */
         COLLECTION,
-        /**
-         * This life time is for objects that need to live until the end of the current search phase.
-         */
-        PHASE,

timeline.bodyText: Why do you need to keep the rescorers ? Can't we build them on each phase like we do for the Query ?
timeline.author: jimczi

replies.bodyText: We set rescoredDocIds in the query phase and use them in the explain of the fetch phase. If we pass the rescoredDocIds around, then we can remove this.
replies.author: dnhatn
